title: Riot is cucking us
body: I went 16/3/7 with {{champion:107}}  top with almost 200 cs and got an A+ and literaly right after that uncuckable action the bug for crashing happens, this is uncuckinbelievable, why didn't i get an S or S+?

replies.body: I guess cuck is the new cool word kids are using

your ranking is measured against other players using the same champ in your rank (bronze, silver, gold, etc) so you need to be doing a LOT better than the average to earn that S. Considering how abuseable rengar is due to his insta-delete pouncing Q is, you really need to step up your game to get that rank on champs like him and potentially assassins in general.
Take your 4chan memes and get off my site.
